about_the_game:
Edelweiss Knights puts the player at the helm of a trio of powerful Saints: Edel, Aliza and Violet. Explore an unspoiled mountain-top domain in search of a mystical source of power, peering into the Saints' inner motivations as the struggle puts their faith to the test. Fight powerful Deities of unbeknownst nature and their mysterious underlings, in a quest to ascend to the Higher Planes of existence.

Win Battles Through Teamwork

Fight the mysterious Godlings and their Leaders, moving each of the Saints across a dynamic grid-based battlefield. Use your wits to position your Units carefully and outsmart the enemy by leveraging on each of your party member's specialities.

Conquer the Battlefield

Lead the Saints across a node-based Map, in a quick succession of tactical skirmishes, each offering random enemy encounters and configurations. Use different tiles' properties and place traps and hazards wisely to solve confrontations efficiently.

Capture Powerful Deities

Align with or against powerful Deities based on your actions and their caprices. Satisfy special requirements to unlock a fateful battle with a Deity, elusive, powerful creatures granting benefits to whoever succeeds in subjugating them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K (3.4 GHz) or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Edelweiss Knight is a turn-based tactics RPG with heavy puzzle and story-driven elements, where players lead a trio of Saints to capture Deities and confront supernatural forces on a dynamic battlefield.
